General.Name: T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited
General.Description: T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes hydraulic machinery and handling equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Manufacture and Distribution of Machinery; Services; and Project Construction Service. The company offers hydraulic presses, including hydraulic clapper die spotting, hydraulic die spotting, hydraulic try out, hydraulic deep drawing, hydraulic hemming, hydraulic molding for hot, hydraulic trimming and bending, and hydraulic special presses, as well as provides automation machines for interior material. It also provides material handling equipment, such as hydraulic hand pallet trucks, table lifts, drum carrier trucks, X-lifts, stackers, hydraulic lift elevators, and dock levelers; and motorcycle lifters and full rise scissor lifts. In addition, the company offers automatic parking lifts, such as two post parking, two post tilt parking, scissor ranking, four post parking, four post double wide, three floors valet vertical parking level parking, three level parking, pit design parking, and rotatory parking lifts; and four post car elevator, car turntable, and conveyor robotic parking, as well as multi " level puzzle, smart tower, and ring typa automated parking systems. Further, it provides home elevators, such as knuckle and telescoping boom cranes, and container lifts; hydraulic static pile drivers; presses mechanical and hydraulic isgec; special materials; and hydraulic cylinders and power units. Additionally, the company offers machine repair and maintenance, and metal machining services. T.M.C. Industrial Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.

5.Name: Mr. Yossakorn  Bomlai
